ingredients: 1 lbs 1.6 oz - Dark Dry Extract [Boil for 40 min] (101.5 SRM) (Grain)
8.8 oz - Light Dry Extract [Boil for 40 min] (8.0 SRM) (Grain)
3 lbs 12.0 oz - Dark Liquid Extract [Boil for 40 min] (101.5 SRM) (Grain)
2.1 oz - Pride of Ringwood [9.0%] - Boil 40 min (Hops)

name: Extract Bruin
